title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating chicken from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken: Seeing chicken expresses many associations that differ depending on considerations, and what concerns us is the interpretation of the dream about eating chicken. An individual can eat grilled, fried, or deep-fried chicken, and then the signs and symbols of this vision are varied, and this will become clear in this article. Learn about Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about eating chickenSeeing chicken in a dream represents women, future projects and plans, or the tendency to constantly think about every detail of life. And if one sees that he is eating chicken, this indicates a halal diet, the blessing of life, and success in work that The person seeks to expand it in the long term. Whoever sees that he is eating chicken, he has achieved remarkable success and progress in some aspects of his life, and has been able to gain a great benefit that will facilitate the next period of his life. But if he sees that he is eating chickens, this is evidence of bad work and conduct. In the wrong ways, and using a corrupt approach to upbringing and upbringing. This vision is evidence of persecuting children, eating orphans’ money, or treating young people harshly and harshly. If the dreamer sees himself eating chicken with great determination, this indicates happy family conditions, practical meetings, family ties, harmony and contentment. About the current situation. This vision is an indication of the pressures of life that are weighing on the dreamer, prompting him to make more efforts and prepare for any emergency events. Interpretation of the dream of eating chicken by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin, in his interpretation of the vision of the chicken, says that this vision shows the wife or woman who cannot find The necessary appreciation for her opinion and decisions, and she may be beautiful, but she lacks pride and support. If the fortuneteller sees that he is eating chicken, this indicates enjoying health, a lawful income, and entering into projects and businesses that bring livelihood and the desired and planned profits. This vision is a sign of blessing, livelihood, goodness, and the end of a difficult period. In the life of the dreamer, there is the beginning of another period in which a person will find many opportunities, and if he takes advantage of them, he will obtain what satisfies them. To him and thank him. And if a person sees that he is in a state of determination and eating a chicken, this is a sign of interconnectedness, unity of hearts, agreement on some matters that were the subject of dispute, and the end of a major disagreement. But if a person sees that he is eating raw chicken, this symbolizes backbiting, gossiping, and entering into skirmishes. And quarreling with others, and fighting many battles that require a person to have a degree of flexibility and quick response. And whoever is sick and eats chicken, this indicates a quick recovery, recovery from a chronic illness, and relief from successive worries and sorrows. If a person sees that he is eating chicken with his hand, this is evidence that he He helps his wife get up from her bed of fatigue, and gives her full support in regaining her health and vitality. In short, seeing chicken is a sign of decent living, purity of heart, sincerity of design, and lawful, halal life. Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken for a single woman: Seeing chicken in a dream indicates her friends and her relationship with them or women who Derived from them

title: Interpretation of seeing a fox in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fox in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, everyone has heard the story of the fox and the girl in the red dress and her grandmother, and there are many people who are afraid of this type of animal, which is considered to be characterized by malice and deception. In general, the individual of this dream begins to search for an interpretation and meaning, so in this article today we will learn together about me, the interpretation of seeing a fox in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fox in a dream, Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the fox in a dream generally symbolizes Lying, deception and intrigue. If someone dreams that there is a fox chasing him and harming him, this indicates that someone close to him is planning a big conspiracy against him. Seeing a fox in a dream without being harmed means that the dreamer will benefit greatly from one of his enemies. Whoever sees in his dream that he is arguing with a fox His dream indicates that he will fall into enmity and competition with one of his relatives. A dream about a fox indicates the presence of liars, astrologers, and charlatans in reality. This dream may indicate the presence of hypocrites in the dreamer’s life. If a person dreams of a fox watching and waiting for him, then his dream indicates that there are Watching him in reality. A dream about a brown fox is a warning to the dreamer that there is a cunning person in his life. As for a white fox in a dream, it symbolizes money and a lot of food that will come to the dreamer. Killing a fox in a dream means that the dreamer will marry a good girl. Whoever sees in his dream that he has obtained Something from the body of a fox, this means that he will defeat an enemy or that an inheritance will come to him through a woman. The dream of drinking fox milk is a promising vision, as it means healing the dreamer if he is sick and saving him from his worries if he is anxious. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fox in a dream for a single woman: The fox indicates In the dream of an unmarried woman, it indicates the presence of a fake person in her life. This dream may indicate that the person is approaching the fortuneteller, but he does not have honest intentions. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is killing a fox, her dream indicates that she will hear bad news. Whoever sees in Her dream that she was attacked by a fox means that in her life there is someone she loves and trusts that she does not deserve. If she sees a fox in a dream for an unmarried woman, this may indicate that she will fail in her studies or leave her job. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fox for a married woman in a dream if she A married woman dreams of a fox, which means that she will inherit a large inheritance, but it will not benefit her. The vision may indicate that there is a person in her life who is intruding on her and constantly monitoring her. A married woman who sees a fox in her dream may indicate that there is a person who speaks to her badly and slanderously, and it may symbolize The possibility of being robbed or cheated. If a married woman sees a fox in her dream, she should be careful, because the dream indicates the presence of a woman she knows well, but she only hates her and seeks to get her into trouble. A married woman killing a fox in a dream means that she will protect her family from harm, as well as Victory over her enemies. As for the fox attacking a married woman in a dream, this means the possibility of her divorce. Interpretation of a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a beard or chin in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a beard or chin? It heralds the arrival of good and adequate nutrition. What is the interpretation of a black beard? An indication of the fulfillment of dreams and desires. What is the interpretation of a long beard? An indication of piety, guidance, and justice. The interpretation of seeing a person with his beard on fire? To expose the viewer to a major personal problem. Interpretation of gray hair in the beard? Evidence of the coming of goodness and ample nourishment. Do you see someone thinning his beard? Evidence that he is suffering from problems. Do you see white hairs on your chin? An indication of his ability to withstand consequences and difficulties. Interpretation of seeing a beard or chin in a dreamIf the dreamer sees a beard or With a beard in a dream, this indicates the arrival of kindness and abundant sustenance. If the dreamer sees a beard in his dream, this may indicate the high status he enjoys. While seeing in a dream the beard reaching to the chest symbolizes reaping many profits and gains. If the sleeper sees the beard reaching to his feet In a dream, this dream indicates a long life for the dreamer. Anyone who sees a yellow beard in his dream may mean that he will suffer from a very serious illness. Seeing beard hair falling out in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer a great financial loss. Interpretation of shaving the beard with a razor in a dreamThe man who dreams That he shaves his beard with a razor, this is evidence of the loss of status and money, and it may be evidence of loss in a project or disruption of what would have benefited him. A wife who dreams of her husband shaving his beard is a sign of migration or rivalry, and he may have left the house for several days. Perhaps this dream indicates his psychological state and that he suffers from many worries and suffers from fatigue and exhaustion. A pregnant woman who sees in a dream that her husband is shaving his beard, this dream is evidence of a safe and good birth. Interpretation of cutting a beard in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is shaving his beard, this dream is a good omen. To the dreamer. There are those who interpret the dream as evidence of fixing something that has brought them problems and problems to the dreamer. It could be a sign of reconciliation between friends or between a father and his son. A man who dreams of cutting his beard and he is over forty, this is evidence of money and good luck, and it is said that it symbolizes a woman who You sing it, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin, who interprets seeing a beard in a dream, has many interpretations because it symbolizes money and status for men, and seeing a mustache in a dream symbolizes fame and honor. Whoever sees in a dream that he is shaving his beard, this dream indicates the deterioration of his affairs and lack of livelihood. As for the one who shaves his mustache in a dream, this is evidence of his giving up on the essentials of his life. Shaving the mustache for a man could be a sign of marriage. Interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream for a man: If a married man sees a beard and there is no beard, then this indicates his birth. Seeing a man with a beard is not Well-groomed, it symbolizes the worries, sadness, and diseases that he suffers from. As for the view? The dream of a black beard denotes the fulfillment of dreams and desires. Seeing a person kissing the beard in a dream without a beard in reality indicates lethargy and laziness. When a man sees that he is shaving his beard with a razor, this indicates that he He will be exposed

title: Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroaches in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroachesSeeing cockroaches is considered one of the disturbing visions, so many people search for a dream interpretation of killing cockroaches in a dream, and this vision can also be evidence of magic and envy or disagreements and problems in the life of a luxurious person.Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted The dream of killing cockroaches in a dream has different interpretations as follows: Seeing cockroaches in a dream can be evidence of the presence of many enemies in the life of an aristocratic person and can be a sign that there are many hypocrites around an aristocratic person and he must take care of them. Killing cockroaches in a dream is a sign To triumph over enemies. Seeing dead cockroaches in a dream means that someone is trying to prevent the dreamer from achieving his ambitions and goals. A cockroach attack in a dream is a sign of many crises and problems that will appear in the dreamer’s life. Seeing cockroaches in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of envy and hatred. For that woman. Seeing cockroaches in a dream is evidence that one is talking about a bad person in front of others. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about being killed with a knife in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing cockroaches in Manal indicates the hatred and envy of the people around the fortuneteller, But getting rid of these cockroaches is evidence of the end of worry and envy. Many cockroaches coming out of the drain is evidence that someone has performed magic on the dreamer. Seeing small cockroaches in the house is evidence of the presence of many problems in the family. Seeing one cockroach in the house is evidence of the presence of a man. An immoral person in the dreamer's life is trying to deceive him and will cause him a lot of problems. Seeing a dead cockroach in a dream is a sign of getting rid of worries and problems. Seeing a white cockroach in a dream means that the dreamer is a traitor to trust. Eating a white cockroach in a dream indicates to the dreamer that there is someone in his life He wants to trap him. Seeing a red cockroach in a dream is a good and praiseworthy vision because it indicates that a sophisticated person will hear a lot of good news in the coming period. This vision can be evidence that the dreamer is in good health, and if he is single, it can It is evidence of his marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroaches in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a single girl living with cockroaches at home, in the bed, in the corners of the kitchen and in the rooms is evidence of many problems, crises and disagreements that this girl faces and is trying to prevent her from progressing and succeeding. It is possible that This previous vision is evidence of breaking off her engagement. If you see yourself eating cockroaches in a dream, this means poverty, need, or illness. A single girl who sees dead cockroaches in her dream is evidence that troubles and pains will end and this girl will receive good news soon. Interpretation of killing cockroaches In a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees cockroaches in her dream indicates that there are many disputes and marital problems with her husband and family.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dolphin in a dream?

preview.html: Hadot presents to you what is the interpretation of seeing a dolphin and its meaning, taken from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Dear all, all the real and reliable facts and interpretations to know the interpretation of playing with dolphins in dreams, as well as seeing a dolphin fish in a complete dream for single and pregnant women as well as men. Why do a dolphin fish dream in a complete dream? Seeing a dolphin fish in a complete dream is one of the visions that indicate happiness And stability, comfort and prosperity. Swimming with dolphins in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness and food and that the dreamer has heard a lot of good news in his life. Some dream researchers have reported that a dolphin in a dream indicates to the dreamer the achievement of goals and aspirations. Seeing a dolphin with high, disturbing waves in a dream is considered complete. One of the dreams that indicate the troubles and problems that the dreamer faces. Playing with dolphins in a dream is completed and the dreamer is happy, which is evidence that he will propose to a beautiful woman and give you a successful marriage. See also: Why dream of fishing in a dream in fullDolphin in a dream in full - Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq mentioned that dolphins In a dream, it is complete, and its presence is often considered a matter of praise, and indicates kindness and happiness to the dreamer. Seeing yourself swimming in a clear and calm sea with a dolphin is evidence of the dreamer emerging from a state of sadness and improving living conditions. A dolphin bite in a dream indicates that he will be betrayed and persecuted by Before someone close to him. There is whole dolphin meat in a dream - one of the visions is that the dreamer is eating forbidden money and earning his money illegally. See also: Why dream of seeing whole sardines in a dream and its meaning? Dolphin symbol in a woman’s dreamThe interpretation of a lonely girl who sees a white dolphin in The dream by Kamel indicates that she heard the good news and that a good and pious person will soon propose to her. Seeing a dolphin outside the waters of a single woman in Kamel’s dream indicates bad behavior and unacceptable actions that they fall into. Being afraid of a dolphin and running away from it in a dream fully indicates that she is suffering. From some troubles and problems in her life. Why does a dolphin dream of a married woman? Seeing a dolphin in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that indicate that she will soon become pregnant with a good heir. Playing with dolphins in a woman’s dream indicates the stability of her life, the improvement of her circumstances, and her emergence from a state of sadness and depression. In addition to that Seeing many dolphins in the sea and arriving on land is one of the visions that shows an abundance of kindness and support that comes into his life. See also: Why does a shark dream in a dream exactly Play with dolphins in your sleep The interpretation of seeing dolphins playing in a dream explains the dreamer’s feeling of security in his life And material and moral stability. Also, watching dolphins playing in a dream is a sign of kindness, safety, and quick recovery from all diseases. Seeing how they play with dolphins and hurting them is a sign that a friend or relative is persecuting and persecuting you. Killing dolphins in a dream means full

title: Interpretation of seeing red and green grapes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin described grapes in a dream as a sign of goodness, blessing and livelihood. The dreamer will receive expenses, but they are not on time or unexpected. Whoever sees that he is picking grapes, this is evidence that he will receive expenses and money from a woman. Interpretation of seeing green grapes in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating green grapes, this is evidence that his position among people will rise and his status will increase. Interpretation of seeing white grapes in a dream Whoever sees white grapes in his dream, this is evidence of his recovery from an illness he suffers from. Interpretation of seeing black grapes in a dream Seeing black grapes in a dream means getting a lot of money and money. Interpretation of grapes in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi says about grapes in a dream that it is good and permissible food, but Al-Nabulsi said about black grapes in a dream that it is so, and if it is good, it is little, and white grapes are a cure for diseases. About the benefits caused by womenInterpretation of grapes in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees grapes in her dream, this indicates a connection with a person and marriage to him, white grapes in a girl's dream are the marriage of an old man, black grapes are a marriage to a young man, green grapes are a marriage to a young man. Marriage to a man of authority and influence, and red grapes are evidence that she can become a second wife. Interpretation of grapes in a dream for a married womanFor a married woman to see white grapes in her dream means pregnancy and the birth of children, and red grapes in a dream for a married woman show her husband's love for her, and green grapes show food and very good, while black grapes show her the love of her husband and his family for her. Interpretation of grapes in a pregnant woman's dreamA pregnant woman who saw in her dream that she was eating grapes, this indicates her health and the health of her fetus, and the date of birth is approaching.

White grapes in a girl’s dream is the marriage of an old man, black grapes are marriage to a young man, and green grapes are marriage to a young man. . Marrying a man with power and influence and red grapes is evidence that she can become a second wife. Interpretation of grapes in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman, seeing white grapes in her dream means pregnancy and the birth of children. Red grapes in a dream for a married woman show her husband’s love for her, green grapes show very good food, while black grapes show her the love of her husband and his family for her. Interpretation of grapes In the dream of a pregnant woman, who sees in her dream that she is eating grapes, this indicates her health and the health of her fetus. The time of birth is approaching.

title: Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: We will show you through our article today the interpretation of death in a dream for singles, because death is the end of life on earth and an introduction to another life later. People often dream of themselves dead or dream of the death of other people around them, so they begin to wonder about the meaning of this disturbing dream and are accompanied by a kind of anxiety and tension about the interpretation of their dreams, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will talk about the meaning of death in one dream. Interpretation of the dream of death in different cases The interpretations of this vision have varied, including: If a person sees himself dying in a dream without any illness, this indicates that he will have a long life. Among the warning visions is that the sinner sees himself dead, as it is a warning of the need to return to God. In the case of dreaming of the death of a close person crying intensely over him, this indicates that the dreamer will come with some difficulties and crises. If the dreamer sees someone dying, but this death was not accompanied by crying, this indicates the arrival of a travel opportunity soon for that person and the acquisition of a lot of money. Some other interpretations of the dream of death say that it is a warning of the need to return to God. Interpretation of the dream of death in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman dreams of her own death without being buried, this means that she will enjoy a good life. If an unmarried woman dreams of the death of someone close to her, this Good news that she will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a lover for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her lover has died, her dream indicates that their marriage date is imminent. If a girl sees her ex-lover dead, this means that the hope of returning to this relationship has been cut off and completely ended. The Angel of Death in a Single Woman's Dream An unmarried girl who sees the Angel of Death smiling at her in a dream is considered a praiseworthy vision, because it indicates that the dreamer lives a long life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she has died and the Angel of Death kisses her on the forehead, this indicates that there are many good things that will happen to her in the coming days. Death in a Single Woman's Dream Seeing death in a dream is a terrible dream, because it portends the coming of trouble. But if an unmarried woman sees other people dying, this indicates bad luck for her and for those who dreamed of their death. To interpret another dream in an encyclopedia, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: I dreamed that I forgot my shoes in the mosque in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I forgot my shoes in the mosque in a dream, and we will then show what it brings.I dreamed that I forgot my shoes in the mosque in a dreamI dreamed that I forgot my shoes in the mosque in a dream. Seeing shoes being lost in the mosque may indicate abandoning acts of worship, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees herself losing her shoes in the mosque in a dream, this may mean her abandoning acts of worship and prayer. If an unmarried girl is seen losing her shoes in the mosque, this may result in her abandoning her duties, and God knows the unseen. When she sees the loss of shoes in the mosque. Losing shoes in the mosque may be a sign of negligence in duties and obedience, and God is All-Knowing. I dreamed that I forgot to wear my hijab in a dream. I dreamed that I forgot to wear my hijab in a dream. It may be a sign of confusion, and God knows the unseen. Also, a dream about forgetting to wear the hijab can express anxiety, and God knows best. When a single girl sees forgetting to wear the hijab in a dream, it can express trouble, and God knows the unseen. If he sees a married woman forgetting to wear it, this may lead to lack of success, and God knows best. The unseen. Interpretation of dreams that the Kaaba was destroyed in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that the Kaaba was destroyed in a dream could indicate the destruction of religion, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees the Kaaba destroyed in a dream, it may be a sign of the corruption of religion, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees the Kaaba destroyed in A dream can express its warning against innovations, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if the dreamer sees the Kaaba being destroyed, this may lead to a warning about heresy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding an earring in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about finding an earring in a dream could be an indication of pride and power, and God knows the unseen, if the dreamer sees himself. He finds a creation that leads to goodness, God willing. If a married man sees an earring and gives the earring to a woman, then it is permissible for him to express what he offers to the woman for her happiness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream in which I found buried gold in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which I found buried gold in a dream can indicate sustenance, with permission. God, if a married woman sees that she has found buried gold, then she will have her money, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees that she has found gold in a dream, it may represent the money and livelihood that she will obtain, God willing. If the dreamer sees buried gold bullion, this may indicate money that he obtained through fraud or Cheating, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream in which I found fifty pounds in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: I received fifty pounds in a dream. To see fifty pounds can mean sustenance and blessing, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees fifty kilograms in a dream, this indicates goodness and happiness, God willing. When a married woman sees in A dream of fifty pounds could be a sign of praiseworthy things, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees fifty pounds, it could be success and excellence, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream that I found a lost child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I found a lost child in a dream, it could be a sign of freedom from problems and worries. God willing, if a married man sees that he has found a lost child

title: Interpretation of seeing three children, twins, girls or boys, in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing three children, twins, girls or boys, and seeing twins in a dream indicates a rich, abundant life, good fortune and good fortune. Seeing male twins in a woman’s dream can indicate problems and tribulations, and for a man it means promotion at work and achieving a distinguished position. We will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing three twin children, girls or boys, in a dream. This article is about the dream of a man, an unmarried young man, an unmarried woman, as well as a married, pregnant, and divorced woman, and some imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and other translators. In the modern era, follow us on the Ruya website. What is the interpretation of seeing triplets, girls or boys, in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing triplets, young girls, in a dream indicates success, success in professional life, and winning prestigious positions. Seeing twins in a dream, this indicates Success, success, and brilliance in professional and social life and earning a lot of money in the sleep of men and women. Seeing twins playing indicates good news, joy, and happiness. Seeing twins crying indicates many problems and problems in life. A sick twin shows bad luck and faltering life. What is the interpretation of seeing three twin children, girls or boys, in a dream for a single woman: If a single woman sees triplets in a dream, this indicates good news and the achievement of the highest positions in science or in the field of work. If she sees If an unmarried girl gives birth to twins, she announces that her wishes will come true and that she will get married soon. Seeing male twins in a dream for a single woman indicates problems and issues that she may face or indicates cancellation of engagement. What is the interpretation of seeing three twin children, girls or boys, in a dream for a married woman? Seeing the birth of triplets in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her marital life and the birth of good offspring. If a married woman sees twins, this indicates that she will be exposed to marital problems or marital problems in the work environment. If a married woman sees triplets, then girls. This indicates good offspring and prosperity. What is the interpretation of seeing three twin children, girls or boys, in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees triplets in a dream, this indicates the ease of childbirth, the ease of giving birth, and the enjoyment of the children in good health. If the pregnant woman sees the twins crying and screaming, this indicates a difficult and difficult birth and problems. In her married life. Seeing the birth of two twin girls in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates good news and a natural birth. What is the interpretation of seeing three twin children, girls or boys, in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees triplets in a dream, it indicates the abundance of goodness and the satisfaction of her desires. In life and obtaining a sum of money. Seeing three girls in a dream separated is that it indicates hearing the good news, the prosperity of life, and the death of its worries and sorrows. Seeing a male twin in a divorced dream is that it indicates a difficult and distressing period that you will go through. What is the interpretation of a dream about having a twin for someone who is not

title: Interpretation of a bed in a dream by Ibn Sirin in different situations

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of a bed in a dream. One of the dreams of many people is to see a bed, and it is known that it is used for sleep and rest, but the interpretation of a dream about a bed varies depending on the condition and shape of the bed itself, as well as the details of the same vision, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will learn about the different interpretations of the bed scene in a dream. Interpretation of a bed in a dream by Ibn SirinFrom the point of view of the scholar Ibn Sirin, if a man dreams of an organized and clean bed, then his dream shows his marriage to a good, obedient woman. As for whoever sees an unorganized and dirty bed, this is a sign of his marriage to a woman who has exhausted him. Among the unpleasant dreams is the dream that the bed Broken or broken, because it warns the dreamer that he will be separated from his wife or fired from his job. Whoever dreams of an organized bed and its color is white, this is a sign that he will move to a new house or get a job. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a single woman: The bed is a symbol of marriage, so if it appears in a dream An unmarried woman indicates her imminent marriage. A bed in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her marriage to a person of high status. If an unmarried woman sees a white bed in her dream, then her dream indicates marriage to a person of high status and status and it may also indicate that she She enjoys stability and psychological peace. An unmarried woman dreams of sitting in bed feeling comfortable, expressing that her future husband will be very respectable and wealthy. Whoever sees in her dream a dirty and untidy bed, this means that there is a person who does not suit her socially or educationally, is proposing to marry her. Symbol of the bed In the dream of a single woman, an unmarried girl who dreams of a clean and tidy bed indicates that the right person will propose marriage to her. If the bed is not made, this is evidence that the suitor who will come before the fortuneteller is not suitable for her. An unmarried woman lying on a bed in a dream indicates the approaching Her wedding date. Whoever sees in her dream that she is sleeping in a dirty and unmade bed. Seeing it indicates that an inappropriate person will propose to her. The appearance of a white bed in an unmarried girl’s dream represents her imminent marriage to a handsome man with good morals and a good heart. If an unmarried girl sees a blue bed in her dream, her vision means that she will succeed in her work or You get a good opportunity to travel or communicate with anyone you want. One of the ominous visions for an unmarried girl is a black bed. It indicates that there are people in her life who hate her and hate her. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is washing her bed. This means that her life will change for the better or she will accept a marriage proposal. A new bed in an unmarried woman’s dream represents a girl with good morals. This dream also indicates that the dreamer will move to a new place where she will be freed from her constraints and will feel comfortable. One vision that has been well interpreted is when An unmarried girl sees a new white bed. She announces the imminent marriage to a wealthy, polite man. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a married woman: For a married woman to see a clean and tidy bed in her dream means that her husband loves and respects her.
